channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Asus ROG Phone 9: Specs, Features, Price, Release Date
item.description: This pricey gaming phone still has a headphone jack and arrives in the US this January.

item.title: Indian news agency sues OpenAI alleging copyright infringement

item.title: Socium doubles down on Francophone Africa after $5M seed round
